final_summary:
Singleton1.java: singleton: Singleton1 acts as a singleton, which gets a Singleton1 Instance to. It is a public class. The only method of Singleton1 is getInstance (Singleton1). No methods call getInstance and getInstance calls no methods.

 memento: Singleton1 acts as a caretaker for memento Singleton1, which gets Instance. Singleton1 acts as an originator for memento Singleton1, which gets a Singleton1 Instance to. Singleton1 acts as a memento, which gets Instance. It is a public class. The only method of Singleton1 is getInstance (Singleton1). No methods call getInstance and getInstance calls no methods.


SingletonClient.java: SingletonClient does not have any design pattern.  It is a public class. The only method of SingletonClient is run (void). No methods call run and run calls 3 methods : format method of class String, getInstance method of class Singleton5 and println method of class out.

 memento: Singleton4 acts as a memento, which gets Instance. Singleton4 acts as an originator for memento Singleton4, which gets a Singleton4 Instance to. Singleton4 acts as a caretaker for memento Singleton4, which gets Instance. It is a public class. The only method of Singleton4 is getInstance (Singleton4). No methods call getInstance and getInstance calls no methods.

 memento: Singleton3 acts as a caretaker for memento Singleton3, which gets Instance. Singleton3 acts as a memento, which gets Instance. No methods call getInstance and getInstance calls no methods.


Singleton5.java: singleton: Singleton5 acts as a singleton, which gets a Singleton5 Instance to run method of SingletonClient. It is a public class. The only method of Singleton5 is getInstance (Singleton5). Only one method ( run method of class SingletonClient ) calls getInstance and getInstance calls no methods.

 memento: Singleton5 acts as a memento, which gets Instance. Singleton5 acts as an originator for memento Singleton5, which gets a Singleton5 Instance to. Singleton5 acts as a caretaker for memento Singleton5, which gets Instance. It is a public class. The only method of Singleton5 is getInstance (Singleton5). Only one method ( run method of class SingletonClient ) calls getInstance and getInstance calls no methods.
